mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.title AS "title", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.remote_addr AS "remoteAddr", a.user_agent AS "userAgent", a.request_uri AS "requestUri", a.method AS "method", a.params AS "params", a.send_office_id AS "sendOfficeId", a.send_by AS "sendBy", a.receive_by AS "receiveBy", a.send_date AS "sendDate", a.success AS "success", a.exception AS "exception"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_log_wx( id, title, create_by, create_date, remote_addr, user_agent, request_uri, method, params, send_office_id, send_by, receive_by, send_date, success, exception ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{remoteAddr}, #{userAgent}, #{requestUri}, #{method}, #{params}, #{sendOfficeId}, #{sendBy}, #{receiveBy}, #{sendDate}, #{success}, #{exception} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_log_wx SET title = #{title}, remote_addr = #{remoteAddr}, user_agent = #{userAgent}, request_uri = #{requestUri}, method = #{method}, params = #{params}, send_office_id = #{sendOfficeId}, send_by = #{sendBy}, receive_by = #{receiveBy}, send_date = #{sendDate}, success = #{success}, exception = #{exception} WHERE id = #{id}
